text: admittedly, the local development experience is not in an ideal state at the moment. but we are working on it (cc <@U6W3H6YN8>)

Thanks <@UEKMY50SU> for helping Doug out here.

Doug, thanks for sharing your use case. I talk a bit about our plans to support a platform agnostic development workflow here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Allow-for-Design-Manager-Design-Tools-to-be-connect-to-a-GitHub/idc-p/270586/highlight/true#M34886>. Make sure and give this idea a :thumbsup:

It is something we are actively working on and thinking about. Previewing is another major problem we are looking into. If you were interested, I would love to chat about your developer experience expectations and needs.
Awesome!  Please let me know if you'd like any input or if I can help in any way.  I've :+1:ed that thread and I'll make some recco's on there as well.
I would give <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/There-needs-to-be-true-staging-testing-environment-in-HubSpot/idi-p/209489> a :thumbsup: as well!
Is there any timeline in place to release this functionality? Or can you tell me where you are in the process?
Asking because I've kind of been charged with establishing a better dev process for our team with HubSpot

:musical_note: Do you want to build a CrankShaft….Come on, let’s go and may
I never see HubSpot boiler anymore…
Come code before…
Internet explorer bombs away.. :musical_score:
